evidence.claim: Zirc Dental Products utilizes AWS for cloud services to manage their operations efficiently.
The company maintains HIPAA compliance for handling health-related data.
Zirc Dental Products has a dedicated section on their website for engineers, signaling their technical capabilities.
They emphasize secure data handling, indicating potential use of health-tech rails such as EHR integration.

icp.icp_reason: Zirc Dental Products focuses on dental supplies, with no evidence of X12 or HIPAA transactions.
